Content: Local populations should always have a minmal cultural output
resisting the streams. So there should alsways be 2% of the population
or a little bit less following local culture instead of the overarching
culutre. Without cultural buildings this ration should be higher
increasing the rate of fractioning in the culutre. The idea is that a
pop has a low passive local culture output but can work in buildings to
express its assigne cultural stream (which will often be a stream
instead of local culture). There should also be buildings producing the
dominant stream directly (e.g. interstellar holo-network stations).
